name: Red Metal
storyline: Crash through a post-apocalyptic world where humanity battles extermination robots and mutated creatures in lush jungles, ancient forests, and desolate deserts. Drive nano-enhanced classic cars, uncover hidden lore, and experience dynamic in-game broadcasts and missions that add to an unfolding non-linear narrative.
summary: Drive to survive in Red Metal, a vehicle-combat action roguelite packed with knuckle-clenching moments and wide variety of unlockable customizations. Mow down hordes of enemies. Perform insane stunts. Dodge nuclear strikes. Just another day in the Resistance. Fuel up. Fight back.
